wikipedia_page.main: Philippa Marion Roe, Baroness Couttie (born 25 September 1962) is a British Conservative politician, who served as Leader of Westminster City Council from 2012 to 2017. Before entering public life she was an investment banker  Citigroup.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: She married James Kenneth Roe in 1958. They have a son and two daughters - one of whom, Philippa Roe, Baroness Couttie, was the Leader of Westminster City Council and now a member of the House of Lords as a Conservative.

link_mentions.page: List of female members of the House of Lords
response: |Philippa Roe, Baroness CouttieDaughter of Dame Marion Roe
